text: Sergey Mikhailovich Koltakov (; December 10, 1955 - September 7, 2020) was a Russian actor. He was born in Barnaul, Altai Krai, Soviet Union. He was best known for his roles as Sergei in Mirror for a Hero (1987), Hank in New Adventures of a Yankee in King Arthur's Court (1988) and as Konstatin in The Life of Klim Samgin (1988). Koltakov died on September 7, 2020 in Moscow, aged 64.Умер актер Сергей Колтаков ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:People from Altai Krai
title: Sergey Koltakov
